data.text: Meva nye abɔ me, nɔvinye nyɔnu, nye ŋugbetɔ;
Medɔ alɔ̃, gake nye dzi ya le ŋu.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ do asi ɖe fesre nu,
Metso be maʋu ʋɔ na nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ,
Zãɖiala siwo le tsatsam le dua me la do gom.
Nye lɔlɔ̃tɔ le keklẽm, eye wòbiã,
Eƒe ŋkuwo le abe ahɔnɛ siwo
Eƒe alɔgowo le abe kutsetse ʋeʋĩ si ɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu,
Eƒe abɔwo le abe sikati si ŋuti
Eƒe afɔwo le abe kpe xɔasi sɔti si
Vivi le eƒe nu me gɔ̃ hã,
